text: Kare (firuaun) wa itta. `Watashi ga yurusanai naka ni, kare o shinjiru no ka. Hontōni kare wa, anata gata ni majutsu o oshieta anata gata no tōmokudearou. Anata gata no ryōte to ryōashi o tagaichigai ni setsudan shite, natsumeyashi no kan ni haritsuke ni surudearou. Anata gata wa dochira no chōbatsu ga yori genjūde, eizoku suru ka kanarazu wakarudearou
